explains: v. 恢复，重建；正在恢复（restore 的现在分词）
wordGroup: backup and restore 备份与还原

sentences.en: Her job is restoring old paintings.
The work of restoring the farmhouse is complete.
sentences.cn: 修复该农舍的工作完成了。

sentences.en: He and his wife Jane were faced with the daunting task of restoring the gardens to their former splendour.
sentences.cn: 他和他的妻子简当时面临着恢复花园昔日风采的艰巨任务。
